summary.span: 用于 BER、CER 和 DER 编码的 ASN. 1 数据的编写器。

span.span: The tag to write, or for the default tag (Universal 4).

summary.span: 指示已关闭带有通用 4 标记的公开八进制字符串，以将编写器返回到父上下文。

span.span: Indicate that the open Octet String with the tag UNIVERSAL 4 is closed, returning the writer to the parent context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 和 模式中，编码内容将保留在单个基元八进制字符串中。In and modes the encoded contents will remain in a single primitive Octet String. 在 模式下，将在需要时将内容分解为多个段。In mode the contents will be broken up into multiple segments, when required.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Formats.Asn1.AsnWriter.Scope PushOctetString (System.Formats.Asn1.Asn1Tag? tag = default);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Formats.Asn1.AsnWriter/Scope PushOctetString(valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.Formats.Asn1.Asn1Tag> tag) cil managed
Public Function PushOctetString (Optional tag As Nullable(Of Asn1Tag) = Nothing) As AsnWriter.Scope
member this.PushOctetString : Nullable<System.Formats.Asn1.Asn1Tag> -> System.Formats.Asn1.AsnWriter.Scope

param.name: tag
param.span: 要写入的标记，或将 用作默认标记（通用 4）。

span.span: The tag to write, or for the default tag (Universal 4).

summary.span: 开始写入带有指定标记的八进制字符串值。

span.span: Begin writing an Octet String value with a specified tag.

returns.span: 将自动调用 的可释放值。

span.span: A disposable value which will automatically call .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只是用于写入八进制字符串值的快捷键，其中内容也是 ASN. 1 个编码系统下编码的数据。This method is just an accelerator for writing an Octet String value where the contents are also ASN.1 data encoded under the same encoding system. 调用时，整个嵌套的内容将被规范化为单个八进制字符串值，并为当前编码规则正确编码。When is called the entire nested contents are normalized as a single Octet String value, encoded correctly for the current encoding rules. 此方法并不一定会创建构造编码，并且在此推送/弹出内写入除八进制字符串以外的值是无效的。This method does not necessarily create a Constructed encoding, and it is not invalid to write values other than Octet String inside this Push/Pop.

summary.span: 写入已编码的单个值。

span.span: Write a single value which has already been encoded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅检查标记和长度是否按照当前规则集进行编码，并且值的末尾是输入的结尾。This method only checks that the tag and length are encoded according to the current ruleset, and that the end of the value is the end of the input. 不会评估内容的语义含义。The contents are not evaluated for semantic meaning.

exception.span: 无法在当前编码规则下读取 。

span.span: could not be read under the current encoding rules.

exception.span: -或- 包含超出第一个值末尾的数据。

span.span: -or- has data beyond the end of the first value.

param.span: 要写入的标记，或将 用作默认标记（通用 3）。

summary.span: 将位数组值作为带有指定标记的 NamedBitList 写入。

span.span: Write a bit array value as a NamedBitList with a specified tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位数组的索引对应于编码格式中的位号，这不同于通过字节数组生成的值 。The index of the bit array corresponds to the bit number in the encoded format, which is different than the value produced by with a byte array. 例如，位数组 `{ false, true, true }` `0b0110_0000` 使用5个未使用的位进行编码。For example, the bit array `{ false, true, true }` encodes as `0b0110_0000` with 5 unused bits.
